'''''Vinyar Tengwar 20''''' is the twentieth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|19|21}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Frodo, Sam, and Gollum at the Morannon" — Alan Lee
* E.L.F. News

* "Source List of the Elvish Languages Found in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''" — Taum Santoski
* "''Essitalmar'': ''Dor Gyrth i Chuinar''" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Words and Devices: The Quick and the Dead" (column) — Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
* "Transitions in Translations: How Many ''Meilen'' are in a ''Lar''?" (column) — Arden R. Smith
